page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: IN THE MORNING I GET UP AT 8.A.M.AFTER I HAVE GOT DRESSED, I COME DOWNSTAIRS AND GET MY BREAKFAST AT 8.05A.M. THEN I GO BACK UPSTAIRS TO GET WASHED. AFTER I HAVE WASHED I GO BACK INTO MY BEDROOM AND READ A FEW BOOKS UNTIL IT IS TIME FOR SCHOOL.THE SCHOOL DAY STARTS AT 9.00 AND WE DO WRITTEN WORK UNTIL THE PLAYTIME BELL RINGS AT 10.30.THE BOYS USUALLY PLAY FOOTBALL FOR THE 15 MINUTE BREAK. LANGUAGE WORK IS DONE UNTIL LUNCH TIME ARRIVES AT 12.30. I GO HOME FOR MY DINNER,WHICH TAKES ME 10 MINUTES TO EAT.I SIT AT MY DESK AND DRAW UNTIL 1.25 AND THEN IT'S TIME TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL AT 1.40. WE GENERALLY DO OUR PROJECT WORK IN THE AFTERNOON.WE HAVE ANOTHER 10 MINUTE BREAK AT 2.30 AND AT 30'CLOCK THE PR.1 AND 2'S GO HOME. FINISH TIME FOR THE REST OF THE CLASSES IS 3.45P.M.
